title: Dwarf In The Future - Novel Updates
tags: Cold Love Interests   Cute Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Dragons   Dwarfs   Elves   Futuristic Setting   Genius Protagonist   Human Experimentation   Humanoid Protagonist   Language Barrier   Power Couple   Power Struggle   Schemes And Conspiracies   Shota   S*aves   Transported to Another World
author: Can’t Play Chess   不会下棋
description:
Qiao Zhiya is a hybrid. Before he was born, his elf father wanted him to have a strong physique unique to dwarfs; his dwarf mother wanted him to have a tall body unique to elves. And then he was born, his features delicate and beautiful, his body weak and thin… his strength at the peak of the dwarfs!

Then he crossed over. With his beloved little hammer, we walk along a females-who-are-as-tall-as-he-is and males-who-are-a-head-taller-than-him-on-average future… blue, thin mushroom wants to go home.

Chu Rong: picked up a small dwarf who always wants to run away. Its cute, wanna drag home.

Qiao Zhiya: ??? Mama, there’s a pervert!>
